remarks: The monic generator of an ideal divides all elements of the ideal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ig1pval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
ig1pval.g $e |- G = ( idlGen1p ` R ) $.
ig1pcl.u $e |- U = ( LIdeal ` P ) $.
ig1pdvds.d $e |- .|| = ( ||r ` P ) $.
ig1pdvds $p |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U /\ X e. I ) -> ( G ` I ) .|| X ) $.
